code: // --------------------------------------------------------------------- @Override protected void flush() {     // until all pending records are confirmed     synchronized (pendingRecordsLock) {         while (pendingRecords > 0) {             try {                 pendingRecordsLock.wait().             } catch (InterruptedException e) {                 // by throwing an exception, we ensure that this checkpoint doesn't get confirmed                 throw new RuntimeException("Flushing got interrupted while checkpointing", e).             }         }     } }
